name: Alien Uber
description:
Avert an Inter-Galactic War by safely delivering Alien Diplomats to the Galactic Peace Council!

(Made in 2.5 days for the Backtrace Game Jam in June 2022)

Our Game Development was mostly streamed LIVE on Twitch and Youtube during the course of the Game Jam.

Instructions:

'WASD' or Arrows Keys to Drive

Press and Hold 'Spacebar' for handbrakes

The Arrow on the top of the screen directs you to the alien diplomat that you need to pick up, and then afterwards points you to the location you need to drop them off to.

(If you somehow get stuck in the terrain, press 'R' to respawn) :P

The Terrain and roads are entirely procedurally generated, you can drive forever in any direction!

All the Music & Art, Including the Futuristic Car, Alien Plants, Tree, Flowers, Alien Environment & buildings were made during the game jam.

Unfortunately, we did not have enough time to flesh out much of the gameplay. Hope you enjoy Driving around in our Alien planet nonetheless, Thanks for dropping by!

Credz:

Kaen_SG - Game Design, Code & often seen holding the glue-gun.

Anurag - Code Massage Therapist

Makileth - Most of the Art you see in the game (and all the art you didn't get to see because we didn't have enough time to implement it!)

CriticalMaxim - Musical Maestro and Sound Extraordinaire

Greenlaser - UI Wizard and dribbles of Art

Beano - Learned how to do Character Animations during the Game Jam!
